idea: K D Shelarak is a medical device manufacturing company based at Mumbai. We are manufacturing Electrosurgical Generator ( Cautery Machine) which is a essential machine required for operation theatre. Our aim is to provide the best technology to all surgeon at affording price. We are also into manufacturing of some other devices required in Blood bank to support the stand alone blood bank, Charitable blood bank for safe blood to support patients and thalassemia children's.
name: K D Shelarak

idea: Future Green Facility Management India Pvt. Ltd. Established in the Year 2017  One of India’s largest indigenous companies in Integrated Facility Management Services  (IFMS), Future Green offers a comprehensive range of smart, innovative facilities  management solutions that target cost effective, sustainable results at our clients’  facilities and workplaces. Our offerings include technical solutions, soft services  solutions, pest management solutions, security Management, business support solutions  and specialized services solutions delivered across a variety of sectors and clients. FGFMIPL Providing Single Contact point of services to our 65 Clients in all over India with   Upgraded   Techniques.   Making   Customers Satisfied   By  Giving   Admirable and Appropriate Services & Support. It Can Possible Only By Combining Our Specialist  Expertise and Experience Team and Tailor Our Operations to Provide High Quality  Services That Meet Evolving Business need.
name: FUTURE GREEN FACILITY MANAGEMENT INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Rather than force-fitting anecdotal advice into your career plan, CareerNodes helps you learn from career paths of millions before you so that your career outcomes are a matter of choice rather than chance.
name: SHORTEST PATH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: NKFC Hub is recognized as the fastest growing start up in India. We are a mobile marketplace for local services. We help consumers hire trusted professionals for all their service needs at their doorsteps. Be it getting a plumbing job done, improving your fitness through yoga, learning to play the guitar, decorating your home or getting candid photos of your wedding clicked, we are sure a shot destination for your service needs. NKFC Hub deals with bollywood directory contact details of artists, production team of a movie. We are India's largest at-home services application. We have also initiated 'Search Plus' services for our users. These services aim at making several day-to-day tasks conveniently actionable and accessible to users to one app. By doing so, it has transitioned from being purely a provider of local search and related information to being an enabler of such transactions.
name: NKFC PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Firi Live is a platform to connect experts in the fields of Cooking, Arts, Health, Fitness etc. with paying customers looking for live, interactive online classes.
name: Firi Live Pvt. Ltd.

idea:
Established in year 2017.…

We Comrade Appliances Private Limited started in the years 2017, are one of the foremost manufacturers and exporters an extensive array of Tower Air Coolers. Designed by the use of excellent quality resources, these are available in several specifications as per the exact requirements of our customers. Our product range is appreciated by our customers owing to their lightweight, easy to use, customized size, reasonable price and long-term durability.

We work with extreme enthusiasm and assure to accomplish great customer satisfaction by offering a high-quality range of tower and air coolers as per their specific needs. In order to convene the accurate needs of clients in the most flourishing way, we offer these tower and air coolers with standard and customized specifications. Backed by a team of experienced staff, we have been able to meet the precise needs of our clients. Owing to our ethical business policies, high-quality products range and reasonable prices, we have increased the number of our satisfied clients.
name: COMRADE APPLIANCES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Kabutarr Dialogues Pvt Ltd (KDPL), initially just a creative start-up, aims to create social impact by facilitating powerful dialogues among citizens. Established in Mumbai, it is now more like a community on its way to becoming an organization, that specializes in designing tailor-made communication solutions for the diverse socio-cultural milieu of India.
name: KABUTARR DIALOGUES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
I am a co-founder of Onefede. Onefede (onefede.com) is a global marketplace for cybersecurity solution sellers and buyers to complete the selling and buying process hassle-free and optimally. Onefede marketplace provides cybersecurity start-ups to register and sell their solution to potential buyers already registered on the platform. The platform provides startups a sales enablement, brand development, channel development and lead generations.
Similarly, it provides buyers registered on the platform access to these solutions thus enabling search, evaluate, acquire and deployment of cybersecurity solutions.
name: SARM Innovations

idea: Multi Components Solutions Pvt Ltd is focused on buying and selling refurbished Laptops and Computer Components. Multi Components Solutions Pvt Ltd has varied network of retailers and distributors dealing in refurbished electronics. The refurbished market in India is booming and there are great returns for us.
name: MULTI COMPONENTS SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
It saves customers time and also products which are not accessible by the Tier-2 and Tier-3 city consumers, will be made available to them through our online platform Most of the startups are focused on gaining revenues and maximizing their profits by using various methods which is a good thing. At the initial stage, most of the startups are bootstrapping their organizations out of their hard-earned money. One of the ways to enhance your earnings is to reduce the cost. Government retain 30% of our income in form of tax which leads to increased cost. We can save this cost for three years by simply registering our startup with the Startup India initiative. Incorporating your business in Limited Liability Partnership or a Private Limited company or a Firm. You must follow the ordinary procedures as a certificate of incorporation, Pan card and other compliances related to the particular type of business. Registration must be after or in 1st April 2016.Registering for a startup is a very easy process. All you need to do is upload a form online with all requisite forms startup India website. The entire process is simplified and made online by the government. Any patent filed and published in patent journals available online or offline.

Incubators who are established in post graduation colleges in India.

Support letter from one of the startups who is funded through central or state Government authorities or any incubator which is duly recognized by the government of India.

Letter of funding which should not be less than 20% in equity by angel or incubation fund.

Incorporation certificate of the business:

You must upload your certificate of the incorporation of your business.

A description of the innovation you included in your product. After getting all the work done you need to go through one more step of getting an approval from the inter-ministry board. It totally depends upon the ministry that they will approve your application or not. Once they approve your application then you will able to register your startup with tax benefits. Startups recognized by DIPP can avail IPR related benefits without requiring any further license.

After getting all the work done you need to go through one more step of getting an approval from the inter-ministry board. It totally depends upon the ministry that they will approve your application or not. Once they approve your application then you will able to register your startup with tax benefits.
name: SILENTSTORE PRIVATE LIMITED
